definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: I just emphasized different elements in a way to manipulate your intuitions.
sentences.chinese: 我只是强调了不同的要素来操纵你们的直觉。

sentences.english: But the elements of that economic model are universal in character.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种经济模式的组成要素是放诸四海而皆准的。

sentences.english: Environmental capacity is a natural science nomenclature to describe the pollution capacity that accommodated by the environmental stuffs.
sentences.chinese: 环境容量是描述环境要素纳污能力的自然科学表述。

sentences.english: But below are the six basic elements you hope to include in your strategy.
sentences.chinese: 但是下面六个基本要素你或许希望包括在你的策略里。

sentences.english: That's why you should never consider it beneath you to revisit the moneymaking basics.
sentences.chinese: 因此你决不能忽视对盈利基本要素的再度审视。

sentences.english: Until now, the rats under study have met two of the three elements of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 直到现在，研究中的大鼠符合成瘾三要素当中的二项。

sentences.english: Remove ambition and the essential elements of society seem to fly apart .
sentences.chinese: 没有雄心，组成社会的诸要素就会分散开来。

sentences.english: Parallel flow through two extended length elements mounted end to end.
sentences.chinese: 通过两个平行延伸长度要素流动式端到端的。

sentences.english: Most of modern economic growth theories neglect the contribution of land element.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段土地要素对我国经济增长贡献显著。

sentences.english: The Medication Guide will be considered to be an element of the REMS.
sentences.chinese: 用药指南将被视为一个新的要素。

sentences.english: Five-person dungeons are a cornerstone of World of Warcraft.
sentences.chinese: 五人地下城是魔兽世界的基本要素。

sentences.english: The effect of city on meteorological elements (for example , temperature)are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 文章探讨了城市对气温等气象要素的影响规律。

sentences.english: The authors also give the model of the inter-gration of factors affecting the impetus behind enterprises , technological innovation.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出了企业技术创新动力要素的整合模型。

sentences.english: Improving the logistic of plant is the sticking point to increase benefit of the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 生产物流的改善是企业提高效益的一项关键性要素。

sentences.english: Meat is, at best, a secondary source of essential elements.
sentences.chinese: 肉类充其量不过是身体基本要素的次要来源。

sentences.english: The practice outlook is the decisive factor in P. E teacher's development.
sentences.chinese: 实践观是体育教育发展的决定要素。

definition: not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
basis point (finance), abbr. to 基點|基点[ji1 dian3]
